arguments.name: Text
arguments.description: The text string containing the characters you want to extract.

arguments.name: Start_num
arguments.description: The position of the first character you want to extract in text. The first character in text has start_num 1, and so on.

arguments.name: Num_chars
arguments.description: Required for MID. Specifies the number of characters you want MID to return from text.
